subject: UNITED BANK  OF AMERICA.
body:
UNITED BANK  OF AMERICA.
CHARLOTTE, NORTH CAROLINA -
UNITED STATES. INT'L REMITTANCE TELEX
DEPARTMENT OFFICE.
Our reference 320/725/US.
This Email is intended for the named recipient only and may contain privileged and Confidential information. If you have received this email  in error, please notify us immediately. Please do not disclose the contents to anyone or copy it to outside parties. Thank you
Dear  
 
From The Desk Of The Executive Director Of UBA America.
 
Dear Sir,
 
 
We have confirmed your email response now and also thank you for the update, kindly proceed and send the $750 to my second secretary account and notify me with the transfer remittance slip as well.
Bank Name: Hope Credit Union
Bank Address: 434 Chestnut St, Chattanooga, TN 37402
Account number: 150000020XXXX
Routing number: 065382514
Account Name: G. J. S.
Beneficiary Address:  Chattanooga, TN 37406.
 
Once you have sent the $750, also send me the transfer slip as well for proper confirmation.
 
 
We are here to serve you better.
 
 
WhatsApp with me only on my direct number +1 (980) 413-2683 for further clarification.
Yours in Service.
Mr. ERNEST Dio.
Head of Computer Credit/Telex Department.
Whatsapp Chat with me only : +1 (980) 413-2683

subject: Re:    UNITED BANK  OF AMERICA.
body:
Hello Mr. Ernest Dio,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information provided. However, I'm a bit confused about some details in your email.

Could you please clarify what exactly needs to be sent to your second secretary's account? Also, could you provide more information about this transfer remittance slip that you mentioned?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: UNITED BANK OF AMERICA.
body:
*United Nation OrganizationInformation Section.760 United Nations Plaza,New
York, NY 10017, USA.RE: DOCKET NO. OP 292.Our Ref: UN/BKL/STBIMMEDIATE
RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$10MILLION ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD.*
Attention: *Barry**.*





*I am writing to confirm receipt of your messages with your complete
information, I have immediately started the process of issuing your Visa
ATM card which will be ready today February 8, 2024 and your atm visa card
and 4 digits pin code will be discovered to you here by email. Meanwhile,
your approval documentation will be ready as soon as possible, once I have
them on my desk, I will forward them to you for your reference aim.I will
update you on the delivery costs as soon as I hear from you today. *





*Thanks for your time and remain blessed. Yours Sincerely,Ms. Kristie
CanegalloU S Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security.*

subject: Re: UNITED BANK OF AMERICA.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about the Visa ATM card. I'm curious, how does this process work? And could you please provide more details about the delivery costs?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: Re: UNITED BANK OF AMERICA.
body:
*United Nation OrganizationInformation Section.760 United Nations Plaza,New
York, NY 10017, USA.RE: DOCKET NO. OP 292.Our Ref: UN/BKL/STBIMMEDIATE
RELEASE OF YOUR FUND US$10MILLION ONLY VIA ATM VISA CARD.*
Attention: Steven *. *



*I, Ms. Kristie Canegallo, acknowledge receipt of your email response.
Please submit your personal details to the assigned bank, United Bank Of
America (UBA), to allow them to credit the US$10 million to your certified
ATM Visa card.Here is the email address of the bank:
unitedbank_arica@usa.com <unitedbank_arica@usa.com> contact them through
the contact email address and submit your personal details to allow them to
go ahead and credit you the $10 million dollars via ATM Visa card
automatically. The Deputy Executive Director of UBA America is Mr. Ernest
Dio. Please direct the message to the attention of * *Mr. Ernest Dio **when
contacting them.*







*Once he has contacted them, let me know the latest developments. Please
note that all supporting documents will be disclosed to you through United
Bank Of America.Thanks for your time and remain blessed. Yours
Sincerely,Ms. Kristie CanegalloU S Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security.*

subject: Re: UNITED BANK OF AMERICA.
body:
Hello Ms. Kristie Canegallo,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about how this process works? How does the ATM Visa card work and why is it being used in this case?

Also, I'd like to know more about Mr. Ernest Dio. What is his role at UBA and how will he assist me in this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Steven
